page.title: 01DRUMBLADE
page.content: Drumblade is a rural area in Aberdeenshire approximately four miles from Huntly. This small area consists of only one school. There are no shops in the area. Drumblade is a rather hilly part of country. There are many farms in the area. Drumblade is a peaceful place apart from R.A.F. jets that occasionally go past.The weather in Drumblade can be quite dodgy with a taste of most kinds (mostly damp). Drumblade farmland is mostly crops and grazing. There is one dairy farm in the four by three kilometre square. there isn't many houses in the area apart from a row of houses at Brideswell.
